pages.title: Polar Bear
pages.text: The polar bear ($(o)Ursus maritimus$()) is a hypercarnivorous bear whose native range lies largely within the Arctic Circle, encompassing the Arctic Ocean, its surrounding seas and surrounding land masses.$(br2)It is the largest extant bear species, as well as the largest extant land carnivore.
